item.title: Coronovirus in India_Dashboard
item.description: Summary Row confirmed valueBox( value = paste(format(sum(df$confirmed), big.mark = ","), "", sep = " "), caption = "Total confirmed cases", icon = "fas fa-user-md", color = confirmed_color ) 14,352 death valueBox( value = paste(format(sum(df$death, na.rm = TRUE), big.mark = ","), " (", round(100 * sum(df$death, na.rm = TRUE) / sum(df$confirmed), 1), "%)", sep = "" ), caption = "Death cases (death rate)", icon = "fas fa-heart-broken", color = death_color ) 486 (3.

item.title: Indian Parliamentary Election 2019 - Part 2- Final Results
item.description: The figure below shows the actual results when the results were counted on 23rd May 2019. The results were overwhelminghly in favor of BJP led NDA (National Democratic Alliance). I would gradually add more analysis figures based on the actual outcomes and basis the data from election commission of India, so stay tuned!

item.title: Indian Parliamentary Election 2019 - Part 1-Exit Polls
item.description: The figure below shows the exit polls results conducted by major Indian television channel and associated poll agencies

item.title: Help that got me started
item.description: This is my first post and I wanted to post this super helpful link which got me started on my website. Blogdown Tutorial

item.title: Cool R Resources-Books and Webpages
item.description: Books R for Data Science Book by Hadley Wickham and Garrett Grolemund Solutions and notes for R4DS by Jeffrey B. Arnold. Work in progress Advanced R by Hadley Wickham Advanced R Solutions Hands-On Programming with R Statistical Inference via Data Science: A ModernDive into R and the tidyverse The Tidyverse Cookbook Edited by Garrett Grolemund Hands-on Machine Learning with R
